Argument.SQL:
SELECT			R.*, 
				CONCAT(R.RevenueProjectTitle, '') AS RevenueLookupCaption, 
				'' AS _Other

FROM			ab_revenue AS R
	/*LEFT JOIN		X AS Y ON Y.YID = R.YID*/
 WHERE R.RevenueIsActive = 1  ORDER BY RevenueLookupCaption ASC
